summary: This is an email chain from August 15, 2019, regarding the availability to serve subpoenas. It originates from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office, indicating coordination for legal process service related to an investigation.

events.title: Coordination to Serve Subpoenas
events.description: An email exchange indicates readiness to serve subpoenas as soon as they are received via email.

keyFacts: The communication is dated August 15, 2019, shortly after Jeffrey Epstein's arrest in July 2019.
The email originates from the U.S. Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General's New York Field Office.
The subject matter is the service of subpoenas, indicating active investigative steps were being taken.
The document is part of the EFTA00092818.pdf file in the publicly released Epstein case documents.
